pages.text: $(br)$(key)Spell Power$() is a mage's core attribute — it directly determines a spell's $(bold)damage$() and $(bold)effects$().$(br2)By default, $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() and $(mage/essence#el)Enlightening Essence$() obtained from loot will belong to the $(mage/school)magic school$() in which you have the highest $(key)Spell Power$() — your $(bold)"specialty"$() school.
pages.title: Spell Power

pages.text: $(br)Ways to increase $(key)Spell Power$():$(br)$(list)Essences: $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() and $(mage/essence#el)Enlightening Essence$()$(br)$(list)Enchantments: Arcane Formula, Sunfire, Soulfrost, Energize, Spellblade$(br)$(list)Equipment: $(mechanic/armor_set)armor set bonuses$() and special trinkets
